title: Why God Has Gray Hair
description: Those were the days! Pre Vatican II, Sister Hedwig, and Father Thaddeus. Step back in time to the elementary days of the 1930's in parochial school. Sophia Zufa offers an insightful, and more times than not, humorous retelling of her youthful days. Meet neighbors, friends, and family, in the sharp-witted and emotionally inspiring collection of tales born of experience. Sophia Zufa will make you laugh and bring a lump to your throat with her stories and anecdotes.
author: Sophia Zufa
